website_summaries.verdict: One of the most popular products on the market for gentle skin cleansing and brightening.
pros: Suitable for all skin types but especially well-liked for sensitive skin, this oil works on wet or dry
Dissolves make-up, oil, and clogged pores to reveal a clean, even complexion
cons: Some customers complain that it stings the eyes slightly if applied too closely

customer_reviews.title: Best eye cream I’ve tried! I have used Lamer for years, needed to find a product less expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Best eye cream! Shocked at how well this product has worked! I’m very particular, I have used Lamer over the years, needed a product less expensive, so looking at the natural ingredients I thought I would try. Truly an incredible find! Try it, you will be grateful you did!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: LOVE ALL PRODUCTS!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE PRODUCTS! I AM 63 AND HAVE NOTICED IMPROVEMENT WITH THE TEXTURE AND FEEL OF MY SKIN!
customer_reviews.author: Penny McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product twice and I must say I am very pleased with the results!!! Absorbs quickly and with consistent use the fine lines around my eyes have seemed to disappear. I have tried many eye creams and this is one I plan on sticking with!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is very easy to apply, absorbs quickly and delivers great results. I've been using it for about four weeks and the fine lines around my eyes have diminished significantly. A little goes a long way so it is a good but, I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina1059

customer_reviews.title: I love it together with the rest of the Numerology line
customer_reviews.text: This makes my skin glow! I love it together with the rest of the Numerology line. It's the only product I will use on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Luna9

customer_reviews.title: Effective eye cream for mature skin
customer_reviews.text: This eye cream is very effective. It moisturizes skin, makes it soft and smooth. It absorbs quickly, and you can see results just in a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Was somewhat helpful, but not the best. I like Baebody eye gel for my whole face.
customer_reviews.author: Farfal

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I'll never put anything else on my face again, awesome !
customer_reviews.author: Susan Castleberry

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for about a week now, I like the way is tightens the skin around the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: What a surprise!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the package I didn't open it because I thought I would get the same results that I have gotten from numerous products of this type that claim they can make your eye problems (puffiness, dark circles, bags) look better. I was pleasantly surprised by this product! Even after the first application about ten minutes later I noticed the bags under my eyes looked less puffy. I am definitely going to continue to use Numerology 55. This eye cream is good!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne B.

customer_reviews.title: Does it Work??
customer_reviews.text: Product has not worked for me like it says it should
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Where to buy more???
customer_reviews.text: This is great eye cream. Gentle and very moisturizing. I want to order more but am having trouble finding it. Can you help?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eye cream really works!
customer_reviews.text: I love the eye cream. Want to buy the moisturizer next.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Wells

customer_reviews.title: It actually produces results!
customer_reviews.text: It really truly works! I am such a skeptic but I read some really good reviews and I can say they are true!
customer_reviews.author: Tizzawn

customer_reviews.title: Moisture without the grease
customer_reviews.text: Best eye cream I've used. Light weight, absorbs well, smells good and best of all you can put your concealer right over it without clumping. I can really tell when I run out of this! I try not too!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo

customer_reviews.title: I love this eye cream
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye cream. This is the first time buying it on Amazon and will be purchasing it again. I received it quickly. Completely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lulu86

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for results
customer_reviews.text: The product is smooth and absorbs well. I like it but I haven't noticed any remarkable results but that may just be me. Also, the color could be improved because it looks more like something from a sinus infection. I'll keep using it though to see if it just takes a bit longer for me to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: I hope it is still good as vitamins and staff
customer_reviews.text: I would give it five starts in the first month of using it. But after 6 weeks it stopped being a cream. When I pump it - the liquid is coming out. I hope it is still good as vitamins and staff, but not the consistency of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing short of amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My wife says this is the best eye serum she has ever used. She had results within days of first application, and she continues to see improvement. No problems with irritation, highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Been using for a couple weeks and have noticed an ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a couple weeks and have noticed an improvement in the skin around my eye. Skin appears plumper and concealer doesn't seem to "sink in" to my wrinkles .

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the high end "Acyl-Glutathione" version available at online beauty stores. I am definitely switching to Numerology products!

customer_reviews.title: Good Eye Cream
customer_reviews.text: I really like this eye cream. A tiny bit goes a long way, it is quickly absorbed and feels great. I have been using it for a short time, but I expect to see good results!

customer_reviews.title: You can't get it out of the bottle
customer_reviews.text: The product might be ok but when you can not get it out of the bottle it is not worth the trouble will not buy again

customer_reviews.title: No results
customer_reviews.text: Used entire container without any improvement in skin texture or line appearance over 6 weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this eye cream! It has done amazing things in just one week to my aged eyes. I will never be without this. Buy it. You honestly won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bing Bing

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure how this got such good reviews and it definitely makes the puffiness under my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how this got such good reviews and it definitely makes the puffiness under my eyes worse. Not sure I am going to trust reviews in the future. I have used it for a week, which would seem to be long enough to see a difference.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love how make you around your eyes look shiner and small good
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Never using anything else
customer_reviews.text: I adore this eye cream. I'm very picky about products - how they feel, how they smell. This one is the first I've found that I wholeheartedly love. I've been using it for 3 weeks and my skin feels great. The product feels light but also very hydrating and the hydrated feeling lasts all day. A little goes a long way. I really like the smell. The ingredients are ethical and the company is awesome - great customer service. I've finally found the right eye cream and I never want to use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: My skin is happier using a product with organic ingredients and I'm happier ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product regularly for a few weeks now on the recommendation of a friend and I am really liking what I see. It leaves my eye area feeling deeply moisturized with a fresh, dewy look. My skin is happier using a product with organic ingredients and I'm happier supporting a conscious, sustainable company.
customer_reviews.author: silverstream

customer_reviews.title: game changer
customer_reviews.text: Best product on the market. Works beautifully and not full of crap ingredients. A real game-changer.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: this product is amazing. i love how it smells
customer_reviews.text: this product is amazing. i love how it smells, my skin looks great--fine lines diminished, the skin under my eyes brighter. and the first ingredient is love and respect. look no further, you've found the real deal eye love.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I am a 44 year old white female and I have just started to see signs of aging around my eyes that I don't like. This yummy eye cream smells amazing and leaves my eye zone looking fresh and plump! I also purchased the face wash and the face moisturizer and within a week of use fell in love with this product line so much that I also bought some for my 19 year old daughter! High quality ingredients with a high vibration process! A wonderful alternative to high-end cosmetic company products that leave you in the dark about their sources or their process.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Baer- Holistic counselor

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!!! I already see results in 3 days and I am not kidding. I haven't left a review on anything but I have to for this. Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product is unbelievable! My eye area is hydrated and lines that were there three days ago are already getting thinner! Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! I love this eye cream
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I love this eye cream. I've been using it for about a week and already notice an huge difference. An absolute must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Proto

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for one week and I already notice the difference! Love that the first listed ingredients are love and respect! I can't wait to try some of the other products.
customer_reviews.author: Nancie Florian

customer_reviews.title: Initial impressions --- one week of use
customer_reviews.text: I received the #55 Eye Cream a week ago. I'm a 39yo female with combonation skin. I have a history of acne with scarring and sun damage. I've especially noticed sun spots in the last year. I've been using EvanHealy Serum for a year or so, a good product that I like. I changed because of a friend's raving recommendation. This price is an exceptional value for quality. In the first week, my skin is brighter. I have healthier color in my cheeks & lips. The smell is DIVINE; my husband likes the smell a lot too. I am using the eye cream all over my face, neck, & hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Allergic
customer_reviews.text: Only used once..... I have very sensitive skin, so from the reviews I figured I would try..... well woke up with eyes almost swollen shut. Not at all saying it’s a bad product! Just beware if you have very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Treeduffina

product_meta.title: Anti Aging Eye Cream with Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Peptides Retinol+Matrixyl 3000 by Numerology Skincare. The Best Natural+Organic Eye Serum for Wrinkles, Crows Feet, Puffiness+Dark Circles
product_meta.description:
Complete Anti Aging Eye Repair Cream

Let Your Beauty Shine Through

- Is the skin around your eyes crepe-y or dry? 
- Does it have wrinkles or fine lines? 
- Do your eyes have dark circles or puffiness? 

Introducing Numerology Skincare's Anti Aging Eye Repair Cream! 

- Therapeutic plant lipids heal and restore saggy, dry and tired skin 
- Vitamin C provides potent antioxidant protection 
- Contains 100% undiluted Hyaluronic Acid that attracts and holds in moisture for a dewy, natural glow 
- Plant Peptides offer increased wrinkle reduction 
- Plant based retinol delivers all the benefits of vitamin A without the irritation 
- Matrixyl 3000 stimulates superior collagen formation 
- Moisture retention and skin structure is enhanced with our comprehensive Amino Acid complex 
- Contains maximum percentages per ounce for fast and long lasting results 
- UV protective packaging maintains peak ingredient integrity 
- Can be used morning and night 
- Gentle enough for sensitive skin 
- Cruelty free 

Trusted by skincare professionals for ingredient integrity and results. Guaranteed brighter, softer and firmer eye skin with less wrinkles and fine lines. 

Say YES to ageless, smooth and firm eye skin and Get Yours Now!
feature_bullets: REAL RESULTS: Consistent, every day use reduces puffiness, dark circles, fine lines and crepe-y, sagging skin. Some customers have even used it on their face as an anti aging facial serum.

SUPERIOR INGREDIENTS: Vitamin C, plant peptides, botanical Hyaluronic Acid, Matrixyl 3000 and botanical vitamin A are all scientifically proven to benefit the skin. Moisturizing plant lipids and anti aging antioxidants round out this formula for a complete eye area makeover.

NON-IRRITATING: This eye cream is gentle and effective. It features botanically sourced vitamin A that delivers the same results as normal retinol without the irritation, along with inflammation soothing plant lipids.
SMOOTH, LIGHT TEXTURE: Goes on smooth, soaks in fast. Leaves a nice, dewy glow on the skin. Can be worn under makeup and in hot weather with no sticky, greasy residue.
CRUELTY FREE: Made with 100% plant-based ingredients, is not ever tested on animals and made in the USA.
